acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Charges framed u/s 376/511/34 IPC R/W sec. 8 POCSO Act

The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side.  Accused persons namely Sri Haliram Chutia and Sri Chenai Changmai are absent. Cause shown by the Ld. counsel vide Pt. Prosecution to take steps.

Case record put up before me as the PO is on leave. The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. Accused persons are absent. Cause shown by the Ld. Defence counsel vide Pt. No. 153/2020 which is allowed. PW Sri Lirik Taba is present. Another PW Smti Rikpe Taba is absent. Cause shown by Sri Lirik Taba vide Pt. No. 154/2020 which is allowed. Presentee PW Sri Lirik Taba is asked to go on PR bond of Rs. 100/- Issue summons to remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps. The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. Accused persons are absent. Cause shown by the Ld. Defence counsel vide Pt. No. 363/2020 which is allowed. PW Sri Lirik Taba is present. Hearing is adjourned as precaution measure due to Novel corona virus. PW Sri Lirik Taba is allowed to go on PR bond of Rs. 100/- Issue summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.                      Fix 04.05.2020 for evidence of prosecution side.
